docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, Aug. 19--The question of Argentine President Juan D. Peron's attitude toward the drive of former President Getulio Vargas for election as President of Brazil is pushing rapidly to the fore here as the main week of the San Martin Centenary observance comes to a close.
